page.title: 07GOVERNMENT
page.content: The town is run by an elected {council of sixteen members one of whom {is elected Mayor for one year by the {members of the Council. }The Mayor may be re-elected for a further term by the Council or if another member is elected the Mayor becomes the Deputy Mayor. In the mid sixties the borough came under the{Restormel District Council and the powers of the Lostwithiel Borough was reduced to the level of a {Parish Council. The Mayor enjoys considerable prestige and is able to mobilize the townspeople for projects concerning the town.
